title: Adobe Muse CC 2017.1.0.821 + Patch {Mac OS X} [CracksNow]
description:
Adobe Muse CC 2017 - Create gorgeous HTML5 websites without writing code. Stay true to your creative roots and design incredible websites with ease — no need to think like a developer. 

Features : 
The easy way to create robust responsive sites. 
See how the latest release gives you unprecedented freedom and speed so you can design and publish websites that dynamically scale to any device. 

- Create responsive web pages with design tools that now include better support for scroll effects on any size screen. 
- With new Adobe Comp CC integration, you can create layouts on your iPad or iPhone and finish and refine your web designs in Adobe Muse. 
- Add animated transitions and engaging scroll effects, make design elements fade in or out, and more. 
- Import native files from Adobe Illustrator directly from a local disk or remote server, without having to export them as SVG files. 

Go from blank page to brilliant. 
Adobe Muse is part of Creative Cloud, which means you can access all your assets — including Adobe Stock — right inside the app and quickly turn any inspiration into a beautiful website. And with Adobe CreativeSync, everything is connected across your desktop and mobile apps. 

All your assets. Always at your fingertips. 
Creative Cloud Libraries store all your colors, images, graphics, fonts from Adobe Typekit, and other creative assets, so they’re instantly available across your desktop and mobile devices
